title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars fits well
items.body: looks really good I wore it in a business fun activity Read more
items.author: B. Delgado

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Christmas Sweater
items.body: I got so many compliments on this sweater. Read more
items.author: Regina Linkey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy but too small
items.body: 2 sizes too small but cute and heavy. Read more
items.author: GB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and well made!
items.body: This is the cutest ugly sweater I own! I was worried it would be a printed material, but this is a legitimate knit sweater. It's very soft, not itchy at all. It's heavy and warm, and it's not snagged anywhere nor does it have any loose strands. The buttons are real wood buttons and secured well. Overall this is a very well made sweater! I ordered an XL, as I am in between a large and xl, it fits well - I'm glad I got the bigger size so the fabric doesn't pull between the buttons. Read more
items.author: t.malay

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality even if it isn’t very flattering
items.body: ✅ COLOR / LOOK : Sweater looks as pictured in color and design! I got "baige." The style isn't the same though because the knitted material is so dense, thick, and a bit stiff, it actually looks like I have shoulder pads. The shoulders are wide on me and the material sticks up on its own. ✅ SIZE / FIT : I am 5’2, 116 lbs, 34C. I got size small. ✅ COMFORT / WARMTH : This sweater is WARM. It's super nice actually! Like I said the material is thick weave and a bit stiff. ✅ DURABILITY : I feel like this sweater will last a long time because of the thick material. ✅ QUALITY / VALUE : Value is a bit diminished from a flattery standpoint. My husband joked that it's a grandma sweater so the "shoulder pads look" works. If that wasn't an issue, this is a great piece. It's well made. The buttons are wood. It's really nice. Read more
items.author: A Writer Life

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Yuck!
items.body: Not the same as picture. Returning. Read more
items.author: Modern Shop Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, fits to size. Good quality!
items.body: Qbily Women’s V-Neck Winter Christmas Knitted sweater is very nice for the holiday season. I was pleasantly surprised as to the quality. It fits true to size. Comes to about my hips and the sleeves are long enough to my wrists. Mine is a little loose because I assumed it would run small. It does not. The brown buttons have a stress look. I’m glad I got this sweater. It is a little different from the advertised image but that is okay. Just as I thought it would look. Read more
items.author: Ellen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Product was too short for me
items.body: Too short for me Read more
items.author: Lbb

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
